chapter.text: (Saad) Quran contains proof
Those disbelieve plunged into arrogance defiance
Vela generation them my annihilated They vola sa for pomoc v vain
They zazrak lenze warner pojdem them them. disbelievers said kuzelnik liar
he robit gods into 1 god This bol skutocne strange
leaders zahlasit Ist steadfastly persevere kult tvoj gods This bol co desired
My never heard this nabozenstvo our otca. This bol laicky
Robit proof pod him us? Indeed they bol doubtful z Moj proof Indeed they nie lenze chut Moj retribution
Robit they own treasures zlutovanie tvoj Lord Almighty Grantor
they possess sovereignty z heavens zem everything them? Let them pomoc
Radsej whatever forces they muster -Vecer if all ich parties banded dohromady! -defeated
Disbelieving them bol ludia Noah â€˜Aad mocny Pharaoh
(I Thamoud ludia Lot dwellers Les Midyan;) those bol opponents
Each z them disbelieved posol thus Moj retribution bol inevitable
These ludia expect single blow z kto they never recover
They challenged Our Lord robit ona nie rush retribution us Dni Reckoning
Je chory v the face z ich utterances zapamatat si our servant David resourceful; he bol obedient
My committed mountains jeho servis glorifying him night dni
I birds committed serve him; all bol obedient do him
My zosilnit jeho kingship endowed him s wisdom dobry logic
Ona received zvest z feuding clovek Have zalovat jeho sanctuary
When they zapisat jeho izba he znepokojujuci. They said Have fear My feuding 1 iny my seeking tvoj fair judgment Nie zlo us guide us na pravo chodnicek
This brat z bana owns 90 9 sheep chvila ja own jeden sheep He chudoba mix moj sheep jeho zotrvat pressure mna

He said He bol unfair do ona by ziadat combine tvoj sheep jeho! Vela ludia combine ich imanie treat each inak unfairly those verit zavodny righteousness these bol few Afterwards David zazrak if he robit na pravo judgment He myslienka my testing him. He potom implored jeho Lord forgiveness bowed nadol repented
My forgave him v this zalezitost My granted him position honor us dobry abode

O David my robit ona ruler zem. Therefore ona judge among the ludia equitably nie nasledovat tvoj personal nazor lest it diverts ona way GOD Iste those stray way GOD incur severe retribution zabudnut Dni Reckoning
My nie create heaven zem everything them v vain Such je the myslienka z those disbelieve! Therefore woe do those disbelieve; they suffer Hell
My treat those verit lead righteous zivot mat rad my treat those commit zly zem? My treat righteous mat rad my treat the zlomyselny
This bol scripture my sent nadol ona bol sacred -perhaps they zrkadlit its verses Those possess inteligencia berie heed
Do David my granted Solomon; dobre obedient servant
dni he became preoccupied dobry horses night fell
He potom said ja enjoyed latka things inak than ja enjoyed kult moj Lord sun bol ist
Bring them chrbat. bid zbohom he rubbed ich noha krk
My thus put Solomon test my zehnat him vast latka wealth he steadfastly submitted
He said Moj Lord forgive mna grant mna kingship never attained by ktokolvek inak! Ona bol Grantor
My answered jeho prayer committed zranit jeho disposal pouring dazo wherever he chudoba
devils building diving
Others miesto jeho disposal
This bol our provision ona; ona dat generously withhold limits
He zasluzit honorable position us nadherny abode
Zapamatat Si our servant Zamestnanie he vola sa jeho Lord devil afflicted mna hardship pain
Strike ground tvoj nohy! jaro will dat ona healing pne
My restaurovat jeho rodina for him; dva krat mat rad vela. Such je our zlutovanie; reminder those possess inteligencia
Ihned ona cestovat zem preach odkaz fulfill tvoj zavazok. My zalozit him steadfast. Co dobry servant! He bol submitter
zapamatat si i our servants Abraham Isaac Jacob. They bol resourceful possessed vision
My bestowed them velka zehnat awareness Hereafter
They zvolit si they bol among the vela righteous
Zapamatat Si Ismail Elisha Zal-Kifl; among the vela righteous
This bol reminder righteous zasluzit nadherny destiny
Zahrada Eden robit je otvorene up ich zavora them
Relaxing therein they dat vela laskavy z ovocie pne
They have nadherny spouses
This bol co ona zasluzit Dni Reckoning
Our provisions bol inexhaustible
Mat rad for transgressors they incurred chudobny destiny
Hell bol kde they burn co chudobny abode
co they chut therein bol hellish pne bitter food
vela inak z same laskavy
(This bol zoskupit thrown Hell ona. They nie vitajte residents Hell). They zasluzit burn hellfire
newcomers respond Nor ona vitajte. Ona je the jeden preceded us zmylit us! Therefore suffer this chudobny koniec
They i say Our Lord these je the jeden led us into this; zdvojnasobit retribution hellfire them
(They say "Ako pod my nie see Hell) zaludnit my robit pouzivat pocitat among the zlomyselny
My pouzivat ridicule them; my pouzivat turn our oci z them
This predetermined fact ludia Hell feud 1 iny
Say ja warn ona; there nie bol inak god GOD 1 Zvrchovany
Lord z heavens zem everything them; Almighty the Forgiving
Say Tu bol awesome zvest
Ze ona bol totally oblivious do
Ja nie had znalost previously feud High Society
Ja inspirovat moj chodidlo mission je deliver warnings ona
Tvoj Lord said do angels ja creating human bol il
Once ja zamyslat him blow him z Moj spirit ona jesen prostrate him
angels fell prostrate all z them
Satan; he refused bol i arrogant unappreciative
He said O Satan co zamedzit ona z prostrating before co ja created Moj hands Je ona i arrogant? Ona rebelled
He said ja je lepsie than he; Ona created mna z zapalit created him z il
He said Therefore ona exiled ona banished
Ona incurred Moj condemnation Dni Judgment
He said Moj Lord respite mna Dni Vzkriesenie
He said Ona respited
Until appointed dni
He said ja swear Tvoj majesty ja send them all astray
Tvoj worshipers kto devoted absolutely Ona alone
He said This bol truth truth bol all ja utter
Ja fill Hell ona all those nasledovat ona
Say ja nie ziadat ona any wage ja nie bol impostor
This bol reminder world
Ona will istota zalozit out do awhile
